## Save plot 

```{r save plot, eval=FALSE}
dte <- Sys.Date()

ggsave(plot = last_plot(),
       filename = str_c("output/", dte, "_kenya_census_map_crops.jpeg"),
       dpi = "retina",
       device = "jpeg", 
       width = 7, 
       height = 9, 
       units = "in")
```
